problem.p:
Here are the instructions for submitting HW4. Submission will be similar to HW3. You will submit a .tar.gz file with various directories of your app:
app/
config/
db/migrate
features/
spec/
Gemfile If you modified any other files, please include them too. If you are using the Virtual Machine, navigate to the root directory for HW4 and run tar czf hw4.tar.gz app/ config/ db/migrate features/ spec/ Gemfile This will create the file hw4.tar.gz, which you will submit. Please note that the auto-grader may take longer than usual. If it takes more than several minutes, try refreshing the page.
